projects.title: Golang ReST API
projects.description: Built for a location based media sharing application
projects.text: A ReST API written in Golang to serve images and manage user profiles. Used SQlite and Redis to store information and used JWT for authentication.

projects.title: Automated Twitter Bot
projects.text: Used the Twitter API in combination with the Tweepy libraries to find and correct misuses of “Defiantly” instead of “Definitely” on twitter.

projects.title: Gobblet AI
projects.text: Built for the Computer Science 2 final project, this AI was built to play the board game Gobblet against human or other AI players.

projects.title: AR Drone challenge For Imagine RIT
projects.description: Programming a Parrot AR drone to perform an autonomous task
projects.text: Participated in the Imagine RIT AR Drone challenge to program a Parrot Drone to navigate an obstacle course and perform autonomous maneuvers using OpenCV and NodeJS
